project_plan.name: Python Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Create a set of multiple-choice questions with answers
Implement functionality to track the user's score
Implement the loop to present questions and evaluate user responses
Write tests to validate the game's functionality (e.g., question display, score tracking)
Execute tests to ensure that the game functions correctly
